title: What does Red Bull have against Pierre Gasly?
description: Lewis Hamilton beats Schumacher’s record, Pierre Gasly makes his case for a second chance at Red Bull and all the take aways from the Portuguese Grand Prix.

itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
